lead_paragraph: DWEK--Joe. On behalf of the entire New York-Presbyterian/Queens family, we are saddened by the passing of Joe Dwek, M.D., an admired and respected physician, who joined the staff at NewYork- Presbyterian/Queens (then Booth Memorial Hospital) in 1965. Dr. Dwek was chairman of the Department of Medicine and program director from 1973-1989 and was chairman of Academic Affairs from 1989-93. Our sincere condolences to Dr. Dwek's wife Sally, his children and grandchildren, and the many people whose lives he influenced. Stephen S. Mills, President Gary Zuar, Chairman, Board of Trustees Ruby Malva, M.D., President, Medical Staff Society Jack Mann, M.D., President, Medical Board NewYork- Presbyterian/Queens 1/3
